episodes.title: Cult Leader Jim Jones and the Tell-Tale Linguistic Signs of a Narcissist
episodes.description:
What makes someone narcissistic and deceptive? What are the linguistic warning signs we should be aware of in our own lives? By looking at the statements and behavior of cult leader Jim Jones, these are the questions this in-depth linguistic analysis gives answers to. How does Jones talk about himself and to other people? What do his statements reveal about his true nature? 

As an analysis, this video is carefully made according to the terms of ‘fair use’. The video has an educational purpose, and you can use many of the principles and concepts to decode your own daily conversations.

Support the work this channel is doing:  https://www.patreon.com/martindecoder
